statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_variation WHERE individual_id = 1;
SELECT individual_id, population_id FROM genetic_variation WHERE population_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variation WHERE variant_type = 'insertion';
SELECT individual_id, allele_1, allele_2 FROM genetic_variation WHERE individual_id = 10;
SELECT individual_id, variant_type, population_id FROM genetic_variation WHERE population_id = 3 ORDER BY individual_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variation WHERE population_id = 1;
SELECT individual_id, allele_1, allele_2 FROM genetic_variation WHERE population_id = 2 ORDER BY individual_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT population_id FROM genetic_variation WHERE variant_type = 'SNP' ORDER BY population_id ASC;
SELECT individual_id, allele_1, allele_2, variant_type FROM genetic_variation WHERE allele_1 != allele_2 AND population_id = 3;
SELECT individual_id, population_id, allele_1, allele_2, variant_type FROM genetic_variation WHERE individual_id < 100 ORDER BY population_id, individual_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE chromosome = 1
SELECT id, allele1, allele2 FROM variants WHERE position < 1000
SELECT id, chromosome, position, allele1 FROM variants WHERE allele1 = 'A' AND allele2 = 'T'
SELECT * FROM populations WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY sample_size DESC
SELECT id, population_name, region, sample_size FROM populations
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE chromosome = 1 AND position < 1000
SELECT id, allele1, allele2 FROM variants WHERE allele1 = 'A' OR allele2 = 'T'
SELECT * FROM populations WHERE region = 'Europe' AND sample_size > 500
SELECT id, chromosome, position FROM variants WHERE chromosome IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY position DESC
SELECT population_name, region, sample_size FROM populations WHERE sample_size BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_individuals FROM species JOIN individuals ON species.species_id = individuals.species_id GROUP BY species_name;
SELECT individual_name, sex, age FROM individuals WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT genetic_id, genetic_sequence FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_rate > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_name = 'Dog';
SELECT individuals.individual_id, individuals.individual_name, species.species_name FROM individuals INNER JOIN species ON individuals.species_id = species.species_id WHERE individuals.age > 5;

SELECT individuals.individual_name, species.species_name, genetic_data.genetic_sequence FROM individuals JOIN species ON individuals.species_id = species.species_id JOIN genetic_data ON genetic_data.individual_id = individuals.individual_id WHERE genetic_data.mutation_rate > 0.05;

SELECT individuals.individual_name, individuals.age, COUNT(*) AS total_mutations FROM individuals JOIN genetic_data ON genetic_data.individual_id = individuals.individual_id GROUP BY individuals.individual_name, individuals.age;

SELECT species.species_name, AVG(genetic_data.mutation_rate) AS avg_mutation_rate FROM genetic_data JOIN individuals ON genetic_data.individual_id = individuals.individual_id JOIN species ON individuals.species_id = species.species_id GROUP BY species.species_name HAVING avg_mutation_rate > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM Population;
SELECT population_name, region FROM Population ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE sample_size > 100;
SELECT distinct ethnicity FROM Sample WHERE population_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, chromosome, genotype FROM Variation WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT * FROM Population WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT population_name, average_genetic_variation FROM Population ORDER BY average_genetic_variation DESC;
SELECT Population.population_name, Sample.ethnicity, Sample.sample_size FROM Population JOIN Sample ON Population.id = Sample.population_id;
SELECT Variation.*, Sample.ethnicity FROM Variation JOIN Sample ON Variation.sample_id = Sample.sample_id WHERE Sample.ethnicity = 'Japanese' ORDER BY Variation.position ASC;

SELECT Migration.*, Population.region AS source_region, Destination.region AS destination_region FROM Migration JOIN Population ON Migration.source_population_id = Population.id JOIN Population AS Destination ON Migration.destination_population_id = Destination.id WHERE Migration.migration_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM population_data;
SELECT sample_id, population_name, location FROM population_data WHERE genetic_variation > 0.5;
SELECT population_name, location FROM population_data WHERE population_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM migration_patterns ORDER BY migration_rate DESC;
SELECT population1_name, population2_name, genetic_distance FROM population_relationship WHERE genetic_distance < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM gene_markers WHERE chromosome_number = 1;
SELECT population_name, location FROM population_data WHERE genetic_variation > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, genotype FROM genetic_samples WHERE marker_id = 3 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT migration_id, source_population, destination_population FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_rate < 0.1;
SELECT population1_name AS source_population, population2_name AS destination_population FROM population_relationship WHERE genetic_distance BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY genetic_distance DESC;
